name: TubbyAI Smart Pet Collar
description: A GPS and activity tracking collar for your pet, integrated with the TubbyAI ecosystem. Durable and waterproof.
voice_description: The TubbyAI Smart Pet Collar, perfect for tracking your furry friend's adventures.

name: TubbyAI Smart Pet Feeder (v2)
description: The ultimate solution for automated pet feeding, featuring a built-in camera and portion control.
voice_description: The latest TubbyAI smart pet feeder, perfect for keeping your furry friend on a schedule.

name: TubbyAI Automatic Laser Toy
description: An interactive, automatic laser pointer toy to keep your cat entertained for hours. USB rechargeable.
voice_description: A fun, automatic laser toy for your cat.
